Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone!
Reviews.Author: D. Brinkley
Reviews.Content: This phone is a fun and easy to use.  I heard, or read, how other users had problems with it locking up,the touch screen malfuntioning, etc...but I have not had one problme with mine.  I bought the phone after all these problems had been fixed.  I rate this high, but I don't think they are making these anymore..shame.  I just bough mine in Spet or Oct of 2010.  Time and technology upgrades just keep on flying by.  The battery lasts a long time.  Not droid or anything, but you can still surf the web and take decent photos.  Great for music! I bought external speakers for this phone, and it sound real good for something so small.  I downloaded two games and I have fun with that too.  Great phone, I think!

Reviews.Title: This phone works for me
Reviews.Author: JHB TX
Reviews.Content: For me, it is small enough to carry in a shirt pocket and light also. YThe battery lasts for days and the screen works well. It isn't for folks that drop there phones a lot because the screen is not as tough as I would like. It is the best phone for me.

Reviews.Title: The phone seemed fine
Reviews.Author: canyonmanterry
Reviews.Content: It was working , But it was the Verizon end of it they would not activated it unless I was put on there. $80 per month pay/plan to go??, I was looking for a 30/50 prepaid/card ??

Reviews.Title: happy as hell ~!
Reviews.Author: robert
Reviews.Content: this is ecactly what they said, and works great had it a few weeks now and not a problem at alll~!~!~ thank you,, buy from here~! im a happy camper~!

Reviews.Title: Another Chocolate
Reviews.Author: lillypad
Reviews.Content: I am ordering my second LG Chocolate...after 3 years of great service I SCREWED it up by allowing the magnetic strip of my bankcard to get too close to screen...I was bummed, so I bought a new phone from Cricket, a samsung of sort---I HATE that damn thing...Too little buttons..it goes out in two months, they say they cant do nothing about it so I ordered a new CHOCOLATE from Amazon and will be happy again...In comparison, my chocolate took better pictures, easier to text on, FM radio was fabulous, never locked up on me, ringer is great...I'll never try ANYTHING else new again....CHOCOLATE for me all the way........

Reviews.Title: Like New
Reviews.Author: maureen mcmahon
Reviews.Content: Although this phone was listed as used, it is like a new phone. It's condition is excellent. I am very satisfied.

Reviews.Title: Great Phone and value
Reviews.Author: king-suave
Reviews.Content: Purchased phone used in good condition. Phone is user friendly. Media functions are great and includes FM radio tuner, EQ and apps to play along with music (drums or piano) 1gb of built-in memory and micro sd expansion slot- touch screen works just fine - bargain for the features - love this phone -

Reviews.Title: nope
Reviews.Author: daz
Reviews.Content: the screen went black after just a week of using it, I'm not happy about it and I'm out the money I paid for it.... grrrrr

Reviews.Title: Some good some bad
Reviews.Author: Sandra
Reviews.Content: I had this cell for 3 years after getting it when it first came out. it was finally ending its days to use so i decided to get another and purchase it from amazon .... The cell worked fine for a day then It was freezing and won't txt correctly .. I have redid the calibration a hundred times no matter what I do the cell seems to ignore me trying to touch it. :(

Reviews.Title: Very good phone
Reviews.Author: Dogman
Reviews.Content: Phone overall is very good. Never had a problem with freezing up. The one main thing it lacks is dictionary for unfamiliar words. Its FM radio is great. Music player is fantastic. Sound qaulity is great. Takes some getting used to the texting with touch screen but overall works well.

Reviews.Title: LG Chocolate Touch
Reviews.Author: Billd777
Reviews.Content: Checked out many phones and reviews before I purchased this one. The touch originally had more bad reviews than good, but I am partial to LG phones. I always check out reviews before a purchase. Well the purchase came in a timely manner and activation was a breeze. First couple of days is usally a learning curve. Phone worked well for several days then it just started doing the off things I read about. Touch screen working when it felt like it, signal strength is most likely the most aggevating. My older phones (6) have better strenth. Updated my roaming many times. I live in a rural area so the coverage is some times sketchy. In the big city works great as it should. But it has never been this bad at home. Have not been able to log onto the net after 20 tries. I am not a big user of this feature anyway. I am sure if I contact the carrier I can get it resolved. Gave the phone 3 stars, maybe a little high. The best feature is the MP3 player, mainly why I bought this model. Very Very Loud! Overall you must have patients to get OK results out of it.

Reviews.Title: This phone is awful
Reviews.Author: Andy Murdock
Reviews.Content: When I first got it, it was pretty cool. I liked that it had a QWERTY keyboard and a touchscreen unlike my previous phone. Everything that a phone should do, it does. The problem is it's so hard to use the phone because of the touchscreen. I haven't had any really critical breakdowns or anything, but the touchscreen comes and goes. One minute, it will work just fine, then I lock and unlock it and it presses the button two down from what I'm actually pressing. The music player is pretty good for a basic phone, but it isn't worth it. You'd be better off getting a different phone.

Reviews.Title: more dints and scratches than i expected
Reviews.Author: Kristie Legge "picky book picker"
Reviews.Content: When we received the phone you could just barely read the packaging addresses. So I was glad to see it made it to me. The phone was listed as " used condition with scratch and dent ". The picture did not match the phone that was sent to me. The dent was bad enough that a screen protecter could not be applied with out a bubble in its place. Overall the phone works great. If I would have know the dent was so bad on the screen I would not have paid for this one.

Reviews.Title: good phone
Reviews.Author: password
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone a year ago and I found nothing wrong with it I like the style it's cute and it is good quality the touch screen is some times iffy but other than that great phone

Reviews.Title: Was great for a while
Reviews.Author: CheyenneHorseLover
Reviews.Content: I've got to say that I loved this phone, for a while. It worked great for more than a year, the screen froze occasionally but it was fine for me. Camera was awesome, the music quality is nearly perfect. After about a year and 2 months, it had a breakdown. I didn't get it replaced, at first we thought it was broken but it came back on after a few tries with the battery. It lasted for about six more months, then broke down five times in the same day- either the screen and external buttons stopped working, it wouldn't come on, or it started buzzing like crazy and went black. So if you want a good phone for about a year, then this one is great. If you want a longer lasting one, I suggest you keep searching.

Reviews.Title: The worst
Reviews.Author: Antonio C. Salvo
Reviews.Content: Avoid this phone.  The touch screen is the most unresponsive piece of garbage ever created.  Text messaging is an absolute nightmare.  It only worked for about the first month I got it.  After that, it went downhill.  Any other phone must be better than this one.

Reviews.Title: Liked the simplicity, music player outstanding
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Had this phone for over a year. It had a pretty tough life in that time.  Occasionally screen would go haywire (not responsive) but it always corrected itself in a few seconds.  Simple, easy to use interface worked very well.  Music player is excellent, way better than the droid x2 I just received. It will not download video (youtube and such)so if your looking for a smart phone, this is not it.  Cruising the internet is marginal at best However, it would get on some social sites, like Facebook, pretty well.  Battery life is also pretty good. I could run a couple days of moderate use without charging it. If your looking for a step up from a basic phone, I think this one would be a good choice.  Did I mention it has an exceptional music player?:)

Reviews.Title: Horrible
Reviews.Author: Kristina B. Mudger
Reviews.Content: I was so excited when I got this phone. It didn't even last 2 months. The touch screen stopped working. BIG WASTE OF MONEYYYYY

Reviews.Title: Chocolate Touch- Neat Idea, but poorly executed
Reviews.Author: Marvolon
Reviews.Content: I was very excited when I saw this phone from Verizon. It came out just before I was eligible to upgrade, so it was nearly perfect timing for me to get one. I was sick of my enV2 constantly messing up, failing to send and receive calls and texts, and buttons not working. This phone was really cool, the first month I had it. It has an MP3 player, 3.2 MP camera and a full touch screen. I treated this thing like a baby, and within the first two months I was calling Verizon for a replacement. It freezes a lot of the time, and like the enV2 fails to send and receive calls, even after I program the phone for the newest update and have a full set of bars for service. The touch screen keyboard is a mess, it usually takes me a few tries to get my text messages right with the words I want before I can send it. The T9(Word Guess) system is very poor as well. It suggests words that don't even exist or don't relate to what you're typing. Even my enV2 had a decent T9 system. So overall I would NOT recommend this phone. It's been just over a year I've had it and I'm already on my 4th "Like New" replacement from Verizon. And again, this is with treating it like a baby. So please take my advice and buy yourself something else. Thanks for taking the time to read my review!

Reviews.Title: My wife
Reviews.Author: Robert Marinez
Reviews.Content: She had this exact phone & was heartbroken when it got wet and stopped working. Except for being unable to delete some of the unneccessary apps she loves the phone.

Reviews.Title: So easy to use...perfect.
Reviews.Author: Lanbert B. West
Reviews.Content: We find this phone to be perfect for us...the phone had been discontinued as Verizon is only offering old style flip phones in an effort to drive more folks to a smart phone.  We wanted one with more features like a touch screen and a good sized keyboard.

Reviews.Title: Happy with my "almost" smart phone!
Reviews.Author: J. Vargas
Reviews.Content: I really am happy with my LG Chocolate Touch phone.  The only problem with using it is that the lowest monthly payment (not in a contract) I  could get was $60.00 a month plan through Verizon.  That was the only bummer.  I am very happy with the phone, as I didn't need a "smart phone."

Reviews.Title: Phone didn't work
Reviews.Author: just me
Reviews.Content: The phone did not work. We were able to text but we could not talk on the phone.  We wanted the phone to use a phone. Very dissapointed!

Reviews.Title: Great little touch phone
Reviews.Author: Ernest J. Armando
Reviews.Content: Excellent phone.Great for anyone who would like a nice slim touch phone and does not want to pay for smartphone data package,Does not have a qwerty keybord if your into texting.

Reviews.Title: You can not activate this cell phone.
Reviews.Author: Pat Norman
Reviews.Content: I have taken this cell phone to three different cell phone company and they can not activate it, or connect it to the internet. I can not get my phone to connect to the server. I have no service. Can I return this phone?

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Justine
Reviews.Content: I just  bought this and I am very happy with it . I love LG products. Would definitely buy more .

Reviews.Title: LG Chocolate Touch VX8575 3G CDMA
Reviews.Author: Sonny Christensen
Reviews.Content: I really like my phone and appreciate the inquiry.  I would definitely recommend this phone and actually already have.Is there a case available for this phone?Sonny Christensen

Reviews.Title: No Reception
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: I Got this phone for my wife, ever since it has been activated I have had maybe 2 full conversations with her on it. All other calls have been dropped for reception issues and I know its not Verizon because my phone never drops calls.

Reviews.Title: False advertising
Reviews.Author: Aggravated
Reviews.Content: Phone is good cosmetic repair overall price great.. No mention the speakers do not work on the item ;(. Would not purchase again

Reviews.Title: Perfect!
Reviews.Author: Juniper Riddle
Reviews.Content: Exactly what I hoped! Brand new, in the box, with charger and all protective stickers intact. I was able to transfer everything except calendar reminders from my old phone to the new one in just a few minutes! I've had it almost 2 months now with no problems!

Reviews.Title: Very nice phone if only I had cell phone service
Reviews.Author: Sharron Cygnor
Reviews.Content: I really started to like the phone, easy to use and I was impressed. But it was Verizon that would not activated the phone.  I have an older cell phone plan that's cheaper than the current plans they offer.  The only way they would activated this phone was if I changed to their more expensive plan even though I did not want the data package.  This is not a smart phone was my argument as well as being a long time customer.  One store manager actually told me customer loyalty means nothing any more.  I went to 3 different Verizon stores and spoke with 3 different managers; I called customer service and always the same response: they refused to activate the Chocolate Touch.  I researched this product for weeks and read there would be no problem to activate.  Unless you have an older and cheaper cell phone plan, Verizon won't activate and doesn't care to lose you as a customer.

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Kelsie
Reviews.Content: I love this phone. It works great to be used. It has a great battery and takes good pictures too.

Reviews.Title: Horrible phone
Reviews.Author: myshelly
Reviews.Content: This phone worked for about 2 weeks before it started messing up. There is no way possible to try to access anything on this phone because the touch screen is so messed up. I was supposed to receive a lightly used phone, but instead received a phone that already had a puncture on the touch screen. Looked absolutely used, and scratched. Bad phone, lies for used phone do not buy.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't Last Long
Reviews.Author: lizzie
Reviews.Content: I've had this phone for less than a year, and it's really not a good phone at all.  It worked well enough for the warranty to wear off, and then it was all downhill from there.  This is the third phone I've had, and my other two both lasted more than 4 years each, so I know it's not me as a cell phone user.  The touch screen does weird things.  While I'm composing a text message it will randomly press buttons on its own. When I have it on the home screen, it will do the same thing and end up calling people and I won't even realize it.. Or it will hang up on people while I'm on the phone with them. It goes into the menu on its own, I have to manually lock the screen as soon as I finish using it so that it won't call or send random letters in text messages to people. The camera is slow and picture resolution is blurry, but that I could live with.  The malfunctioning touch screen, I cannot. I would definitely not recommended this phone to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Worst Phone Ever Created
Reviews.Author: Auston
Reviews.Content: I have had my fair share of good phones and bad phones, as has everyone. But this phone happens to be the worst cell phone ever created. The touch screen constantly fails. I have had it replaced 3 times (and I bought it in February) and it still fails. Everyday I want to throw it at a wall and smash it into little pieces. Or bring it out into a field and go Office Space on it.  DO NOT BUY THIS PHONE. You will regret every second of it.

Reviews.Title: this phone was not a good one. no camera no pictures not good sound.
Reviews.Author: Frannie Antonucci
Reviews.Content: This phone was not in good working condition. The camera did not work. The phone sounded terrible and it would not update my contacts. I sent the phone back and I am hoping that I am not charged a restocking fee. Ia m keeping my old lg.
